trans-unit.source: Represents a class that is used to configure how the service authenticates users that use user name/password authentication and to configure the caching of logon tokens.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe que é usada para configurar como o serviço autentica os usuários que usam a autenticação de senha/nome de usuário e para configurar o cache de tokens de logon.

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured for user name/password-based authentication, the relevant properties for this class are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma das associações usadas por um serviço estiver configurada para autenticação baseada em nome/senha do usuário, as propriedades relevantes para esta classe são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: These properties include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades incluem o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured to use Windows authentication for user name/password, the settings related to caching of logon tokens are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma das associações usadas por um serviço estiver configurada para usar autenticação do Windows para o nome de usuário/senha, as configurações relacionadas ao cache de tokens de logon são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: These settings include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Essas configurações incluem o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum length of time that a token is cached.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o comprimento máximo de tempo que um token é armazenado em cache.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that represents the maximum length of time that a token is cached`.` The default is 15 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.TimeSpan>que representa o comprimento máximo de tempo que um token é armazenado em cache`.` o padrão é 15 minutos.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether logon tokens are cached.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os tokens de logon são armazenadas em cache.

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] security asks the Windows security subsystem to create a logon token for every incoming user name/password security token if the user name is being mapped to a Windows account.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] segurança solicita que o subsistema de segurança do Windows para criar um token de logon para cada token de segurança de nome e senha do usuário, se o nome de usuário está sendo mapeado para uma conta do Windows.

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento pode ser alterado definindo a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses Win32's `LogonUser` function for user name/password authentication.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>modo, o serviço usa do Win32 `LogonUser` função para autenticação de senha/nome de usuário.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: If the CacheLogonTokens is set to `true`, the resulting Windows token is cached and reused for the same user name/password pair.
trans-unit.target: Se o CacheLogonTokens for definido como `true`, o token do Windows resultante é armazenado em cache e reutilizado para o mesmo par de nome e senha do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The cache is valid for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O cache é válido para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of caches is limited to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de caches é limitado a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if logon tokens are cached; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os tokens de logon são armazenadas em cache; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um validador de nome e senha de usuário personalizada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> to take effect.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>propriedade deve ser definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>entrem em vigor.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>está definida e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>propriedade não for, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] usa a autenticação do Windows e ignora o valor da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>modo, o serviço usa <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>para autenticação de nome e senha do usuário chamando o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: A custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: Um validador de nome e senha de usuário personalizada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Windows groups are included in the security context.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os grupos do Windows é incluída no contexto de segurança.

trans-unit.source: In most scenarios when validating Windows user names and passwords, Windows groups in which users belong provide useful information for authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos cenários ao validar nomes de usuário do Windows e senhas, grupos do Windows na qual os usuários pertencem fornecem informações úteis para decisões de autorização.

trans-unit.source: However, if the Windows groups are not required, setting this property to `false` can improve performance by avoiding a full-group claim population.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se os grupos do Windows não são necessários, a definição dessa propriedade `false` pode melhorar o desempenho, evitando uma população de declaração de grupo completo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Windows groups are included in the security context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se grupos do Windows são incluídos no contexto de segurança; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de tokens de logon para o cache.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 128.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 128.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de tokens de logon para o cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o provedor de associação.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>modo, o serviço usa <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>para autenticação de nome e senha do usuário chamando o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> for the MembershipProvider to take effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>propriedade deve ser definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>para MembershipProvider entrem em vigor.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the MembershipProvider property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the MembershipProvider property.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade MembershipProvider é definida e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>propriedade não for, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] usa a autenticação do Windows e ignora o valor da propriedade MembershipProvider.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> property is set to `MembershipProvider` and the `MembershipProvider` property is not set to a value, the default is the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>está definida como `MembershipProvider` e `MembershipProvider` propriedade não está definida para um valor, o padrão é a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>classe</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> for this service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>para este serviço.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref href="System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o <xref href="System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: É feita uma tentativa de definir esta propriedade quando a credencial é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method of validating the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o método de validação de nome de usuário e senha.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> If this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, the service uses the object returned by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> to validate user names and passwords in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis são:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>se essa propriedade é definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, o serviço usa o objeto retornado por <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>para validar nomes de usuário e senhas em mensagens de entrada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service is hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS) using transport-level security and the UserNamePasswordValidationMode property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, the custom authentication scheme uses a subset of Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviço é hospedado no Internet Information Services (IIS) usando a segurança de nível de transporte e a propriedade UserNamePasswordValidationMode está definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, o esquema de autenticação personalizado usa um subconjunto da autenticação do Windows.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: That is because in this scenario, IIS performs Windows authentication prior to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] invoking the custom authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre porque, nesse cenário, o IIS executa autenticação do Windows anteriores ao [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] invocando o autenticador personalizado.

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, specify the membership provider by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property, and then the membership provider instance specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is used to validate the username and password in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor dessa propriedade é definido como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, especifique o provedor de associação, definindo o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>propriedade e, em seguida, a instância do provedor de associação especificado pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>propriedade é usada para validar o nome de usuário e a senha em mensagens de entrada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration in <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de enumeração em <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode"> </xref>.
